tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: Ivory Coast is rich in cultural diversity, boasting various ethnic groups, each with its traditions, music, dance, and vibrant festivals.

tidbits.title: Natural Beauty
tidbits.description: The country offers natural beauty with lush forests, diverse wildlife in national parks, and stunning coastal areas along the Gulf of Guinea.

tidbits.title: Cocoa Production
tidbits.description: Ivory Coast is a leading global producer of cocoa, playing a significant role in the world's chocolate industry and its economy.
